        public java.util.List<Product> findAllProducts()
                                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                               com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        find all the products inside the table and generate a pdf report in tabular form
        Returns:
        all the products into a list
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the path is incorrect
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException - if the format is not correct
